duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, test, and implement applications using Microsoft Azure and .NET Core technologies.
Work within the SAFe Agile framework and utilize CI/CD best practices for application development.
Interface with the Technical Product Owner and IT partners to develop acceptance criteria for features and user stories.
Perform unit tests, monitor results, and take required corrective actions as needed.
Optimize and enhance applications and interfaces to meet SLA/functional requirements.
Assist product owners in systems analysis and creation or updating of documentation for all business processes.
Participate in new product reviews, tests, and pilots with IT members, customers, and stakeholders.
Perform feasibility studies/proofs of concept to evaluate solutions.
Participate in structured walk-throughs, secure coding, and technical reviews ensuring application coding and design follows secure coding and design principles.
Assist in the production support and maintenance of applications.
Actively participate in all team Agile ceremonies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent combination of education, training, and experience. SAFe certification or training is preferred.
